member.name: F:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.LastHitNPC
member.summary: The last NPC referenced in OnHitNPC() for this player

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapping
member.summary: Set to 15 after a tap, decremented every frame. Registers a double tap and resets to 0 if another tap is input while above 0.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapped
member.summary: Set to 15 after a double tap, decremented every frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapUp
member.summary: The player has double tapped Up on this frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapDown
member.summary: The player has double tapped Down on this frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapRight
member.summary: The player has double tapped Down on this frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapLeft
member.summary: The player has double tapped Right on this frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapSetBonus
member.summary: The player has double tapped their Set Bonus key on this frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTapAny
member.summary: The player has double tapped a direction on this frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTappedUp
member.summary: Set to 15 after a double tap. Decremented every frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTappedDown
member.summary: Set to 15 after a double tap. Decremented every frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTappedRight
member.summary: Set to 15 after a double tap. Decremented every frame.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.DoubleTappedLeft
member.summary: Set to 15 after a double tap. Decremented every frame.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.TitaniumShards
member.summary: List of current Orchid Titanium Shards owned by this player.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.HideAllDrawLayers
member.summary: If true, all player Drawlayers will not render.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.OrchidDamageResistance
member.summary: Divides damage taken by the player by the sum of all damage resistance bonuses.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.OrchidDodgeChance
member.summary: Chance of taking damage. Defaults to 1. Multiply this value instead of reducing it! If this value is 0 or lower the player has a 100% chance of dodging damage. Displays Black Belt's dodge visual.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Common.ModObjects.OrchidPlayer.SpawnTitaniumShards(Terraria.DataStructures.IEntitySource,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Spawns custom Orchid Titanium Shards, and refreshes the player's Titanium Barrier buff.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.GuardianQuarterstaffAnchor.DoAnimStyle(System.Int32,System.Single,Terraria.Audio.SoundStyle)
member.summary: Executes the given animation style. ai should begin at 40 and decrement to 0 for the animation to play in correct order.
member.remarks:
Animation style IDs
0: Jab (default jab)
1: Double swing (default swing)
2: Single swing

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianGauntlet.OnPunch(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Boolean@,System.Int32@)
member.summary: Called right before a punch projectile is spawned. Return false to prevent normal punch projectiles from spawning.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianGauntlet.OnParryGauntlet(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Entity,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called after the player parries damage.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianGauntlet.PreGuard(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called when the player presses the guard button to begin guarding while at least one gauntlet can guard. Return false to prevent guarding. Defaults to guardian.UseGuard(1). Returning true without calling guardian.UseGuard will allow the player to guard without resources.
member.param: A gauntlet currently eligible for parrying. Will be the main hand gauntlet if both can parry.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianGauntlet.PlayGuardSound(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Responsible for playing the sound when the player begins guarding with the weapon. Default behavior is SoundEngine.PlaySound(SoundID.Item37, player.Center);

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianGauntlet.PlayPunchSound(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Responsible for playing the sound when the player punches with the weapon. Default behavior is SoundEngine.PlaySound(charged ? SoundID.DD2_MonkStaffGroundMiss : SoundID.DD2_MonkStaffSwing, player.Center);

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianGauntlet.PunchSpeed
member.summary: Jab and slam animation speed multiplier. Also affected by melee speed, but not by usetime.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.SwingChargeGain
member.summary: Multiplier for the amount of bonus charge gained from hitting with a melee swing.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.CannotSwing
member.summary: If true, the warhammer will never be swung.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.HoldOffset
member.summary: offsets the drawing of the warhammer while being held (in pixels). Negative values draw it closer, while positive further.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.BlockVelocityMult
member.summary: Multiplier for the initial velocity of the hammer when blocking.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.hasSpecialHammerTexture
member.summary: If true, the anchor will load and use ItemName_Hammer.png as its texture.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.ThrowAI(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Called before default throw AI. Return false to prevent the default AI from running.
member.remarks: Remember to set Projectile.friendly and OrchidModGuardianProjectile.ResetHitStatus() if overriding default behavior.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.PreDrawHammer(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color@,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.Texture2D@,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle@)
member.summary: Called before drawing the hammer. Return false to prevent the default draw code from running.
member.remarks: The default draw code will use hammerTexture and drawRectangle (which defaults to null)

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianHammer.PostDrawHammer(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.Texture2D,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Rectangle)
member.summary: Called after drawing the hammer.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianParryItem.OnParryOther(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Specifically called if the aggressor when initiating the parry is neither an NPC nor a Projectile.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianParryItem.PlayParrySound(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Responsible for playing the sound when the player parries with this weapon. Default behavior is SoundEngine.PlaySound(SoundID.Item37, player.Center);

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianProjectile.FirstHit
member.summary: Set to false in ModifyHitNPC when this projectile or specific anchor attack hits an enemy a second time. Flagged before most hit functions.
member.remarks: As the name suggests, this will be true on only the first time hit functions are called. Useful for effects that are only supposed to trigger once per projectile, such as resource generation.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianProjectile.NotHitYet
member.summary: Set to false in ModifyHitNPC when this projectile or specific anchor attack hits an enemy for the first time. Flagged before most hit functions.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianProjectile.Strong
member.summary: Whether this projectile is the main attack from either a fully charged attack, slam, or a quarterstaff counterattack. Defaults to false and is set otherwise by Anchor AI or specific projectiles in their SafeSetDefaults.
member.remarks: Used for limiting hit effects to only important attacks. A charged attack or slam being consumed should generally only result in one Strong projectile hitting, including the anchor itself if it can hit. Most anchors will flag themselves as Strong by default, but it should be set manually if overriding their normal functions.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianProjectile.ResetHitStatus(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Resets FirstHit and NotHitYet to true, and sets Strong to the input bool.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianQuarterstaff.PreJabAI(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called before uncharged jab or mid-charging jab AI is executed, including repositioning the quarterstaff and the player's arms for its attack animation. Return false to prevent normal AI from running, effectively overriding JabStyle.
member.remarks: During a jab, Projectile.ai[0] is set to -40 as an animation timer and incremented by JabSpeed every frame until it reaches 0. Use Projectile.ResetLocalNPCHitImmunity() for multi-swing animations to allow them to hit multiple times. See GuardianQuarterstaffAnchor for examples of default JabStyle behavior.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianQuarterstaff.PreSwingAI(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called before fully charged swing AI is executed, including repositioning the quarterstaff and the player's arms for its attack animation. Return false to prevent normal AI from running, effectively overriding SwingStyle.
member.remarks: During a swing, Projectile.ai[0] is set to 41 as an animation timer and decremented by SwingSpeed every frame until it reaches 1. Use Projectile.ResetLocalNPCHitImmunity() for multi-swing animations to allow them to hit multiple times. See GuardianQuarterstaffAnchor for examples of default SwingStyle behavior.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianQuarterstaff.JabStyle
member.summary: Indexes into GuardianQuarterstaffAnchor.DoAnimStyle to get jab animation AI.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianQuarterstaff.SwingStyle
member.summary: Indexes into GuardianQuarterstaffAnchor.DoAnimStyle to get swing animation AI.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianQuarterstaff.JabChargeGain
member.summary: Multiplier for the amount of bonus charge gained from hitting with a jab.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianQuarterstaff.QuarterstaffFrames
member.summary:
The amount of animation frames of the quarterstaff texture.
The animation frame must be set manually using GuardianQuarterstaffAnchor.QuarterstaffAnimFrame.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.SlamHitFirst(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile,Terraria.NPC)
member.summary: Called once per slam, when the slam first hits an enemy.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.SlamHit(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile,Terraria.NPC)
member.summary: Called when this shield's slam hits an enemy.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.Slam(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called on the first frame of a slam.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.SlamEnd(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called on the last frame of a slam.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.Push(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile,Terraria.NPC)
member.summary: Called when an enemy collides with the shield during a block. Will be called once per frame per enemy colliding with it.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.Protect(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called once per block when the first enemy or projectile is blocked. This is called after Push or Block, but before Block destroys the projectile.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.Block(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called when a projectile collides with the shield during a block. Return true to destroy the projectile. Defaults to true.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.BlockStart(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called on the first frame of a block.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.BlockEnd(Terraria.Player,Terraria.Projectile)
member.summary: Called on the last frame of a block. Will spawn dust at the end of a block if it returns true

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.shouldFlip
member.summary: Causes the shield's held sprite to flip when facing right.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.useDiscreteAim
member.summary: If true, the shield will be rotated in discrete steps, instead of a single continuous circle. Defaults to false.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.discreteAimIncrements
member.summary:
The amount of steps per half-rotation that the shield will snap to, if useDiscreteAim is true.
A value of 0 results in only a single possible angle, directly in front of the player. Otherwise, there will be twice as many snap points as this value.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.discreteAimRotation
member.summary: The angle, in pi/2 increments, that the base angle will be rotated by.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianShield.lockSlamRotation
member.summary: If true, slams performed with the shield will be locked to the rotation they started with, rather than being free to rotate mid-slam.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.OrchidModGuardianStandard.DrawCustomFlag(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Graphics.SpriteBatch,Terraria.Projectile,Terraria.Player,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Color,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,System.Single)
member.summary: Overrides the default flag drawing, but still renders the shaft. Return true to prevent the default flag from being drawn.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Guardian.Projectiles.Misc.GuardianHorizonLanceAnchor.GetHorizonGlowColor(System.Single,System.Single,System.Single)
member.summary: Mimics the HorizonGlow shader, returning a color modified by the given phase similar to what the shader would provide.
member.remarks: Can take either a float or a Color as the input color. Will automatically cast phase to float if it is a double. Example usage: GetHorizonGlowColor(Math.Sin(Projectile.timeLeft * 0.05), 0.5f)
member.param: Color phase of the shader. 1 is orange, 0 is white, and -1 is blue. Will automatically cast to float if a double is passed, such as from Math.Sin.
Brightness of the default greyscale color. Defaults to fully bright.
Alpha of the default greyscale color.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.AttackRate
member.summary: The interval between Attack() being called.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.TargetRange
member.summary: The maximum range the ShamanWeapon can target enemies in.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.MoveSpeed
member.summary: The rate at which the ShamanWeapon moves during Movement().

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.BondTime
member.summary: How long this ShamanWeapon currently lasts for. Increases while holding its item.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.NotActivated
member.summary: Whether this ShamanWeapon hasn't been activated yet. While true, snaps to the player's position and doesn't use most of its AI. Becomes false when BondTime reaches 60 for the first time, which also calls Activate()

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.CurrentTarget
member.summary: The position this ShamanWeapon is currently trying to attack. Defaults to Vector2.Zero if the ShamanWeapon has no target.
member.remarks: By default AI, this is set to Main.NPC[TargetNPC].Center in Target(). FireShamanWeapons prioritize setting this to the projectile owner's OrchidShaman.FireTarget if OrchidShaman.HasFireTarget. Override Target() to change this behavior.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.HasTarget
member.summary: Alias for CurrentTarget != Vector2.Zero.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.TargetNPC
member.summary: Array position in Main.NPC of the NPC that CurrentTarget's position is based on. Defaults to -1 if the ShamanWeapon is not targeting an NPC.
member.remarks: Can be used to retrieve additional information about the NPC being targeted, such as for predictive aiming. By default AI, this is set to the projectile owner's OrchidShaman.NearestTarget, and will be ignored by Fire ShamanWeapons if OrchidShaman.HasFireTarget.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.AttackCooldown
member.summary: The amount of frames before Attack() is called again. Decremented by 1 every frame that it's above 0.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.TargetCooldown
member.summary: The amount of frames before Target() is called again. Decremented by 1 every frame that it's above 0.
member.remarks: Use for multi-stage, animated, or continuous attacks to avoid interrupting them midway through. Set TargetCooldown and AttackAnimation to the same value to resume targeting as soon as the animation completes.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.AttackAnimation
member.summary: Optional variable for storing an attack animation timer. Automatically decremented by 1 every frame that it's above 0.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.VisualOffset
member.summary: Optional variable for drawing the weapon's visual offset.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.VisualCenter
member.summary: Alias for getting or setting VisualOffset using an in-world position instead of an offset.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.OldVisualOffset
member.summary: The total offset of both VisualOffset and Projectile.oldPosition from Projectile.position.
member.remarks: This is an alias for VisualOffset and does not store its own variable. Before updating VisualOffset on a frame, this effectively returns the offset of anything drawn with VisualOffset on the previous frame. Useful for Vector2.Lerp() smoothing.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.OldVisualCenter
member.summary: Like VisualCenter but with OldVisualOffset instead.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.BehindPlayer
member.summary: Whether the default override for DrawBehind places it in the BehindProjectiles layer. Will otherwise place in the OverPlayers layer. Defaults to false.
member.remarks: Can be used for swinging or orbiting animations to give the impression of three dimensional movement.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.Movement(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2)
member.summary: Handles ShamanWeapon movement.
member.remarks: Override and call base.Movement() with different variables to modify movement target without changing behavior.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.Target(Terraria.Player,OrchidMod.OrchidShaman)
member.summary: Handles ShamanWeapon targeting.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.Attack
member.summary: Overridable method for generating ShamanWeapon attacks. Called when AttackCooldown is 0 or less and HasTarget is true, immediately after AttackCooldown is set to AttackRate.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.StartAttackAnimation
member.summary: Method to set variables at the start of an attack for a ShamanWeapon that uses AttackAnimation. Return true to call Attack() immediately. Returns true by default.
member.remarks: This method is called immediately before Attack() if AttackAnimation is not greater than 0. Set AttackCooldown to set a delay before the next time Attack() will be called, and set TargetCooldown to prevent changing targets mid-animation. If AttackAnimation is higher than AttackCooldown then Attack() will be called during the animation.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.ExtraAIActive
member.summary: Called at the end of AI each frame while the ShamanWeapon is activated.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.ExtraAIInactive
member.summary: Called at the end of AI each frame before the ShamanWeapon is activated. On the last frame before becoming active, Activate() will be called instead of this.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.Activate
member.summary: Called when the ShamanWeapon becomes active, on the first frame its BondTime exceeds 120.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.GetFloatAnimation(Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,Microsoft.Xna.Framework.Vector2,System.Boolean,System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Single})
member.summary: Call to return position for standard ShamanWeapon animations, bobbing up and down, staying a fixed distance from the player's center, and animation smoothing.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.Content.Shaman.ShamanWeaponAnchor.GetInactiveAnimation
member.summary: Call to position the player's hand and return visual offsets to appear in it properly.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.ProjectilesBlockBlacklist
member.summary: Current timer for slam stack regen or degen. Increments slams at 1 or higher, decrements at -1 or lower.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianGuardRecharge
member.summary: Natural guard generation multiplier. The player will naturally generate this many guards every 10 seconds.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianSlamRecharge
member.summary: Natural slam generation multiplier. The player will naturally generate this many slams every 10 seconds.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianRegenThreshold
member.summary: The ratio of guards and slams out of the player's maximum that can naturally be regenerated before the regeneration penalty takes effect. Default is 0.5.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianGuardRecharging
member.summary: Current timer for guard stack regen or degen. Increments guards at 1 or higher, decrements at -1 or lower.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianSlamRecharging
member.summary: Current timer for slam stack regen or degen. Increments slams at 1 or higher, decrements at -1 or lower.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GauntletPunchCooldown
member.summary: Cooldown in frames between starting a new punch charge since starting the last one. Can begin a punch when 0 or lower, goes down to -10. Half of the gauntlet's punch animation time is added when a charge is started.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianCounter
member.summary: Allows the player to trigger counterattack effects. Set when able to use an item that has counterattack effects. Use GuardianCounterTime to check for counterattack eligibility.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianCounterTime
member.summary: Timer for performing a counterattack if GuardianCounter is true. Set to 60 after guarding with a gauntlet, or to the block or counter duration after guarding with a pavise or quarterstaff. Will always be 0 if GuardianCounter is false.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.GuardianCounterHorizon
member.summary: Makes the GuardianCounter indicator flash Horizon colors instead of red.

member.name: M:OrchidMod.OrchidGuardian.ResetStandards(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Resets all boolean-controlled Standard effects. Called in OrchidGuardian.ResetEffects and GuardianStandardAnchor when a standard is switched. forceReset controls whether to respect OrchidGuardian.GuardianStandardBuffer to give one frame of leeway.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.NearestTarget
member.summary: Array position in Main.NPC of the nearest valid target NPC for ShamanWeapons to attack. Set to -1 by default and if the player has no active ShamanWeapons.
member.remarks: Any active ShamanWeapons without special targeting behavior will choose to attack the Center of this NPC and ignore all other NPCs, and do nothing if this NPC is outside of their range, by their default AI.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.FireTargetRelative
member.summary: Whether this player's FireTarget mirrors the player's movement.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.FireTarget
member.summary: The position FireShamanWeapons are currently targeting. NearestTarget will be ignored by FireShamanWeapons while this is set. Defaults to Vector2.Zero.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.EarthTarget
member.summary: The position EarthShamanWeapons are currently targeting. The player's position will be ignored by EarthShamanWeapons while this is set. Defaults to Vector2.Zero.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.NearestTargetEarth
member.summary: Array position in Main.NPC of the nearest valid target NPC from the position of EarthTarget. Set to -1 by default and if EarthTarget is null. While there is an EarthTarget, any active EarthShamanWeapons will choose to attack the Center of this NPC and ignore all other NPCs, and do nothing if this NPC is outside of their range, by their default AI.

member.name: F:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.ShamanWeapons
member.summary: List of ShamanWeapon projectiles this player owns.

member.name: P:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.HasFireTarget
member.summary: Alias for FireTarget != Vector2.Zero

member.name: P:OrchidMod.OrchidShaman.HasEarthTarget
member.summary: Alias for EarthTarget != Vector2.Zero
